data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 2, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in for Seattle at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 3, Jair Marrufo signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Throw-in Seattle.
In Orlando, Mark Anthony Kaye (Los Angeles) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Seattle at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz is on target but unsuccessful.
Diego Rossi (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 7, Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
In Orlando Los Angeles attack through Latif Blessing. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 9, Seattle have a goal kick.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Eduard Atuesta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?

Goal! Los Angeles take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Diego Rossi spot-kick..

Los Angeles drives forward and Diego Rossi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.

Brian Schmetzer is making the team's second substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Joevin Jones replacing Nouhou Tolo.
In the minute 71, Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a third substitution, with Will Bruin replacing Kelvin Leerdam.
Goal! Seattle reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Will Bruin.
That's a fine assist from Joevin Jones.
In the minute 77, Raul Ruidiaz of Seattle smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Free kick Seattle.
Francisco Ginella is replacing Mark Anthony Kaye for Los Angeles at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 80, Los Angeles make their third substitution with Danny Musovski replacing Mohammed El Munir.
Will Bruin for Seattle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.

In the minute 82, Goal! Los Angeles extend their lead to 1-3 through Diego Rossi.

Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.

In the minute 88, Seattle make their fifth substitution with Josh Atencio replacing Shane O'Neill.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Goal! Brian Rodriguez extends Los Angeles's lead to 1-4.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Los Angeles will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seattle.

The match has come to a close in Orlando. The final score is 1-4.
Jose Cifuentes is on a sub for Diego Rossi for Los Angeles.
